worker_agent.name: Worker Agent
worker_agent.description: Analyzes user tasks and generates detailed step-by-step execution plans
worker_agent.trigger: Analyze Task on Task Input Panel

sentinel_agent.name: Sentinel Agent
sentinel_agent.description: Risk classifier that evaluates Worker plans against 6 dimensions
sentinel_agent.trigger: Evaluate Plan on Plan Display Panel

workflow_execution.flow: Input → Worker Agent → Sentinel Agent → Output
